title: Bargain of the Lost Goods
dialogue: Hey there, friend! You look like someone who appreciates a good deal! I've got a small problem—some of my goods for the festival got lost in the woods! If you can help me gather some Mystical Herbs and Rare Gemstones, I’d surely make it worth your while! You know what they say, 'a penny saved is a penny earned!' What do you say? Let's make a bargain!
